values: Thanks!

No problem, take as much time as you need.
The numbers you gave me do not match the credit card we have on record. Please try a different credit card.

values.text: Please confirm the last four digits of the debit card number.

values: Please confirm the last four digits of the debit card number. You may say it out loud or type it on the keypad, followed by the pound sign.

values.text: Great! Your payment has been processed. Is there anything else I can help you with?

values: Okay.

Ok, well normally I would ask you what was wrong but I don't currently handle that case so I'm going to assume everything is OK and move on.

values: Thank you!! <break/> To confirm I will schedule a payment of \$600 to the Visa Debit Card ending in $debitCardNumber, for tomorrow, <? today().plusDays(1).reformatDateTime('EEEE, MMMM d yyyy') ?>... Is that correct??

name: Collections-Demo-DNN-SMS to Account Phone Number
description: This conversation will support sending and receiving  SMS messages during the voice session. The caller will choose the demo.
